actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase from $2,100 to $2,500 (or $3,600 in the case of a widow with minor children) the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases from $2,100 to $2,500 (or $3,600 in the case of a widow with minor children) the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without dedutions from benefits under the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance benefits of the Social Security Act. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 403 (f)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase from $2,100 to $2,500 (or $3,600 in the case of a widow with minor children) the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deductions from benefits thereunder.
